ComicInfo.Title: apr
ComicInfo.Summary: Theresa woke up to find herself changing into a monster. She's taken from her family and put into an internment camp with other kids going through the same thing. She is given a choice: she can surrender to becoming a mindless beast, or join Behemoth, a pack of creatures trained to kill for the U.S. government. But which choice will make her more of a monster?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-18 08:18:20. [CVDB486228]
ComicInfo.Penciller: J. K. Woodward, J. K. Woodward
ComicInfo.Inker: J. K. Woodward, J. K. Woodward
